articles.author: Antony Sguazzin, Alberto Nardelli and Megan Durisin
articles.title: SA conspiracy communities 'targeted' by Putin propaganda against 'global famine' criticism - News24
articles.description: European governments have been alarmed by a Russian disinformation campaign that seeks to deflect criticism that President Vladimir Putin’s war with Ukraine risks leaving millions of people in Africa facing famine.
articles.content:
• Russian diplomats are pushing the narrative that sanctions, rather than Russian blockades, are causing shortages of grains and fertilizer in Africa.
  • Russian embassy officials across A… [+7696 chars]
